name: Lily of the Valley (itch) (Triptech)
description:
Lily of the Valley

Protect a community from wildfires in this submission to the Arkwright Engineering Scholarship.

Wildfires are one of the problems that affect us increasingly due to the effects of climate change. Into the future, we need to be aware  of how to minimise the risks. This game aims to educate and inform in a fun way that will be engaging to a younger audience.

Learn about protection and prevention, from a local to a global scale. Each objective gives explanation on its use.

This game is best played on an HD screen and is only Windows-compatible.
